name: SlyCicle
description:
Create ice-slides that allow you to traverse quickly in this low-res environment while listening to a holiday themed soundtrack.
Click and hold your left mouse button to place a short but fast slide!

Zoom on it using your arrows/WSAD and jump off in the declared direction.

WSAD/Arrows to move left and right.

Hold W/Up to jump higher, even off slides!

Left mouse button - create size-limited slides that help you to parkour! (<>, AD to move on them)

W/Up to jump off the slides early.

Press Tab to instantly delete the slide (just in case you get stuck).

Handy hint arrows will tell you the right arrow to press to go wherever you want to.

Unique challenges accompanied with an amazing respawn system, giving you all the support you need.

Snow signs will show you the way!

Someone is waiting!
